title: Value Is Function
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of functions in JavaScript. We will learn how to define and call functions, pass arguments, and return values. Additionally, we will practice using the isFunction() function to check if a given value is a function. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of how functions work in JavaScript and how to use them effectively in your code.

meta.title: Mastering JavaScript Functions
meta.description: Explore the power of functions in JavaScript and learn how to define, call, and use them effectively.

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Executed
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
